title: Face What’s In Front of You First
description:
“It’s a tempting cognitive bias but ultimately a paralyzing one. Worse, it is often complicit in very preventable evil.”

Ryan discusses why you need to concentrate on the present moment, on today’s Daily Stoic Podcast.

***

If you enjoyed this week’s podcast, we’d love for you to leave a review on Apple Podcasts. It helps with our visibility, and the more people listen to the podcast, the more we can invest into it and make it even better.
